author: jstrachan
msg: Applied patch from Kelvin Tan to improve the jelly Servlet and provide a JellyServletContext

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied patch supplied by Todd Jonker to improve the error reporting when a Tag library cannot be loaded and fixed a typeo in the exception message

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied the new test case supplied by Todd Jonker that demonstrated the bug in missing line/col info on a unit test case failure.
This bug has now been fixed as well.

author: jstrachan
msg: I've added a new <x:comment> tag to output a comment to the underlying XML event stream.
So it can be used inside any Jelly script via either
I've added JellyUnit test cases to ensure this works (see the end of the file)

author: mvdb
msg: Now using getLocation and getProject instead of directly referencing the protected instance. This instance will be deprecated in the next ant release, that's why it caught my eye.
